## Overview

```{r}
library(sf)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
# Load world data
world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")

# Transform to projections
world_goode  <- st_transform(world, 54052)       # Goode Homolosine
```

```{r}
names(world_goode)
```


```{r}
plot(world_goode,max.plot = 1)
```

```{r}
ggplot(world_goode)+geom_sf(aes(fill=pop_est))
```


```{r}
ggplot(world_goode) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = pop_est), colour = "white", linewidth = 0.15) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(
    option = "cividis",
    trans = "log10",
    labels = scales::label_number(scale = 1/1),
    name = "Population Est."
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Population Estimation in Goode Homolosine Projection",
    subtitle = "CRS: ESRI 54052",
    caption = "#30DayMapChallenge 2025 | Day19 Projections\nData: {rnaturalearth} | Map: Federica Gazzelloni"
  ) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "inside",
    legend.position.inside = c(0.1,0.3),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold",hjust=0.5),
    plot.title.position = "panel",
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 11,hjust=0.5),
    plot.caption = element_text(hjust=0.5,size=8),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", 
                                    colour = NA)
  )

```
